entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
